column5: To nights Festive perch plate is gona leave Santa out in the cold ........what  ya think  . Let the holidays begin .......
Lookin good there Skip....enjoy your dinner
Your doing it up right skip. It looks like you may be ready for christmas .
i am looking foreward to ice up for some perch fishing...   mmmmm
dinner looks great! Need less fruit and more beer, or any beer...lol.. I know that Santa would rather a coors light over a glass of milk any day..lol

Sorry there guys , i was buisy at changing the looks of that picture if you know what i mean .....lol . It was a little surprize the wife made up for me tonight and now am wondering what thats going to cost me... lol , ya got to love a mrs claws like that .  Wish you all could have been here to share .
Any Lancaster fish sauce on that perch skip?
NO ! MIKE , have to pick some up next time i am down that way , plus some of that St Alberts .
Good one Skeeter , got to hear some of it , dam dail up takes to long .
If you need a knife like that to cut thru yer perch...
Mom made me a fresh jar of sauce for Christmas... Mmmmmm
Lucky bugger Mike ! Think she'd make me one , i have money .....lol
Icut every thing i eat no mater , and that one is my favorite knife ..... lol
She's picky who she cooks for...
Thays a new one on me MIKE , all the mothers down that way would never see a home boy go hungry .

It's the same with her meat pies...  Anybody who has ever had em says there the best they ever had...  Only my mom knew the recipe...  Now my fiancé as well as my brothers fiancé know the recipe... That's it...
You better stop there Mike , i consider my self a food conasuor , just always on the look out for the good stuff ... lol .  Meat pie's ...dam it , is moms recipe the french one .
